Description: PayXpert offers payment processing solutions that optimize the revenues and bottom lines of its partners, currently servicing 650+ clients.
Full Description: PAYXPERT is one of the most prominent fintechs in the payments sector. The firm was created in June 2009 due to the growing demand from businesses requesting a more robust, efficient and agile payment gateway than could be supported by banks across Europe. The company has become a leading fintech company, specializing in the development and provision of payment solutions for both physical and electronic (online) merchants, and acts as an acquiring bank, payment gateway and a payments technology developer within the payments industry. Registered as a Payments institution, PayXpert has offices in London, Lyon and Barcelona.  PayXpert can operate as a trusted Payment Facilitator with its acquiring bank partners, giving the ability to contract directly with merchants for payment processing services, connect to banks to process the transactions, and remit transaction settlement to merchant bank accounts to complete the transaction processing cycle.  Alternatively, PayXpert can act purely as a sales and technical solutions partner for acquiring banks and other payment gateways routing transactions to acquirers who process transactions and handle the remittance to the merchant.  Also, PayXpert supports POS payment software development and can provide acquirers with card scheme certifications across several different POS hardware devices including PAX, Sunmi and Castle PayXpert is a direct member of payment Schemes such as Alipay, WeChat Pay and Mir and its payment gateway can support a wide range of APM’s. Additional payment Scheme memberships will be added early in 2021.
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Financial Services, Payments, Software
Industries: E-Commerce, FinTech, Payments, Point of Sale, Transaction Processing

Our tailored campaigns focus on each business’s unique needs, selling points and target audiences to ensure we deliver top performing results for our clients across a range of industries.  We are a multi-award winning agency and our bespoke campaigns have been recognised by international awards bodies, including nominees at The Drum Recommended Digital Agency Awards 2020 for Search and Content Creation/Strategy, and finalists for the UK Search Awards 2020 for Best Small SEO Agency and Best Use Of Search in the Retail and eCommerce Sector amongst many other awards nominations. Since our inception in 2008, Absolute Digital Media has gone from strength to strength, even during the uncertainty and turbulence of 2020 and lockdown.  Over the past year, we have doubled our workforce, created a new Digital PR department and secured new international clients; demonstrating the need for digital expertise and the trust our clients have in our services.  Our aim is to enable all our clients to beat their competitors and be the best in their industries for digital promotion and appearance. We achieve this through a multi-channel approach, offering bespoke digital marketing packages to suit the unique needs of our clients and deliver tangible digital results, after all we’re your partners in all things digital.  The A-Team have specialists across all fields, decades of experience in the industry, and a vital market knowledge across your sector to help give your campaign the edge. The flexible nature here at Absolute Digital Media also means we’re happy to fit in with an existing strategy you may have, or provide an entirely new campaign suitable for local, national and international audiences.  Part of the key to our successful relationships with our clients, is the close communication we offer, with a dedicated client services manager to answer queries and provide you with updates about your campaign along the way. We're not just your agency, we're your partner.

Description: Prop Store, one of the worlds leading vendors of original movie props and costumes.
Full Description: In 1998, Prop Store founder Stephen Lane’s love for movies led him to begin hunting for the same props and costumes that were used to create his favourite films. He found that he could not only provide collectors with access to their most coveted pieces, but also establish archival standards for this new, pop-culture hybrid of fine art and memorabilia collecting—prop art. Once Stephen assembled his dream team of like-minded movie fanatics, Prop Store set out like a band of movie archaeologists, looking to locate, research and preserve the treasure troves of important artifacts that hid in dark, sometimes forgotten corners all over the world. Now, more than twelve years later, the prop hobby and Prop Store are thriving. With over fifteen employees between their offices in London and Los Angeles and over 15,000 combined square feet of archived props and costumes, we’ve become the busiest and most trusted authority in the hobby. Thinking of starting your own collection? Give us a call or e-mail and we’ll arrange a tour through one of their incredible galleries so that you can see the limitless possibilities that await.

Description: We buy people's vintage and/or valuables in bulk, at scale. On a mission to find all unused vintage items a new home.
Full Description: We're on a mission to give everything old and interesting a new home... People have cupboards, attics, lofts and garages full of wonderful old vintage items. However, there’s no fast and easy way to sell it all, so it sits in homes for years. So we created the easy way for people to sell their old valuables. Jewellery, precious metals, silver and silver plate, watches, medals, militaria, toys, cameras, old currency, and more.  1) We cover the cost for our customers to send us a box of old and vintage items.  2) Our experts carefully appraise the box and make the customer an up front cash offer.  3) They choose from a same day payment, or choose to have their box returned for free. It’s a free to use, haggle and hassle-free service, and it’s loved by thousands. Once we own a box of items, the products take on a whole new journey. Our marketplace team seek to maximise return by selling through more than 12 different auction houses, marketplaces and wholesale buyers.  ...    We set up Vintage Cash Cow in 2015. It has its headquarters in Leeds in the United Kingdom.

Their Customers: Fashion brands who sign up and pay a commission for qualified sales leads and access to data about users purchase intent. Install the Bagzee extension and then visit your favourite online retailer. Find a product you love. Click the Bagzee button and they will track it for you and alert you when the price drops or the sales start. If the price is still to high you can make your own secret bid and Bagzee will alert you if the bid is accepted. With Bagzee you choose the price your willing to pay. e.g Full Price, Sales Price or Bid Price.
Industry Groups: Clothing and Apparel, Commerce and Shopping, Design, Gaming, Mobile, Other
Industries: E-Commerce, Fashion, Gamification, Mobile, Real Time

Description: D2C plant brand with a design-led subscription, unique range of indoor plants, plant decor products & B2B installation service.
Full Description: Leaf Envy is designed to transform people's lives through nature. They are the destination of plant decor for the modern plant lover and guide you on your plant parenthood journey - from plant newbie to fanatic.  Leaf Envy’s roots have flourished alongside founder Beth’s personal love affair with the botanical world. Transforming her home into a foliage-filled retreat from which to escape to, Beth discovered how difficult it was to navigate the world of plant care, and find unusual plants and perfectly-fitting pots that matched her style. Leaf Envy is that vision - helping people find, style and care for nature indoors.  The company was founded in 2019 and Leaf Envy started doing pop-ups on a boat along Regents Canal. Quickly outgrowing this floating jungle, Beth joined Google for StartUps Female Founder program in 2019 and officially launched the e-commerce, subscription & B2B offering in October 2020. Leaf Envy is based in London, United Kingdom and delivers across the UK.  In 2020, they launched a B2B Plant Installation & Maintenance service and have worked with a range of brands including Google, Grind Coffee, Soho Home and Accenture to name a few.

Description: Go Instore is a unique technology that closes the gap between the online and offline worlds.
Full Description: Go Instore humanises online commerce and experiences with their leading immersive live video technology solution. By connecting staff at physical locations to website customers, Go Instore enables rich online human interactions that have successfully increased revenues for companies across sectors including retail, automotive, hospitality and property.  They help to address the vast disparity in customer experience and conversion rates between physical and digital channels, and solves the key ecommerce challenge of how to convert more onsite traffic into buying customers.

Description: People Tree is a company which make clothing and accessories with people & the planet in mind.
Full Description: A pioneer in sustainable Fair Trade fashion, our story started in 1991. The core mission has stayed the same over the past three decades since award-winning social entrepreneur Safia Minney founded the company. Every product is made to the highest ethical and environmental standards from start to finish. Contemporary, versatile designs and playful, exclusive prints inspired by the V&A archives create stylish, innovative and affordable fashion while respecting people and the planet. Collections featuring organic cotton, TENCEL™ Lyocell and responsible wool, are made using traditional artisan skills such as hand weaving, hand knitting, hand embroidery and hand block printing.
Industry Groups: Clothing and Apparel, Commerce and Shopping, Design
